attributes.action: Lower the abortion limit! stop 24 week abortions!
attributes.background: My daughter born exactly 24 weeks gestation came naturally, fully formed, fighting for her life. She was born breathing by herself too! Currently still in NICU. Stop abortions at 24 weeks! And Lower the abortion limit!

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123050

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.

We should like to add our congratulations on the safe delivery of your daughter, and every good wish for her future health and happiness.
